snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Tuesday, selections include bitcoin millionaires ready to cash out, a prediction on the evolution of the PC and a look at why iPhones are...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Tuesday, selections include bitcoin millionaires ready to cash out, a prediction on the evolution of the PC and a look at why iPhones are named the way they are.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Texting on 'Sherlock' and Ethereal Images
